title: Use Codefresh CLI
description: Use the Codefresh CLI to perform application operation
author: Itay Shakuri

usage_sample.content: {"annotate_image":{"image":"codefresh/cli","description":"annotates image with metadata","command":"annotate image IMAGE_ID -a key1=value1 -a key2=value2"},"run_pipeline":{"image":"codefresh/cli","description":"run a pipeline","command":"run PIPELINE_ID -b master"}}
